PrimaryDecayNotification: <color=lime>DecayNotifications</color><color=cyan>: Your base is going to decay in <color=lime>{0}</color> minutes </color>
FinalDecayNotification: <color=lime>DecayNotifications</color><color=cyan>: You have no items in your tool cupboard and your base has started to decay!</color>
NoPriviledge: <color=lime>DecayNotifications</color><color=cyan>: You do not have any building priviledge</color>
NoPermission: <color=lime>DecayNotifications</color><color=cyan>: You do not have permission to use this command
HelpTextAPI: <color=yellow>/tcstatus - Check the amount of minutes left you have before your tool cupboard decays!</color>
